MESSAGE: 1 of each trait that can be found in a SOUL,
We have found 6 of the traits thus far,
Once we find the final variant, my Lord, Yharim will be able to destroy humanity for trapping us here,
Lucky for us a child wandered into our territory with a red soul, the last variant we need...
but I shall kill you, rip your soul out, and give it to my Lord regardless.
Though know next time we meet I'm going to kill you,
